original_text: The Lord chased all the nations out as we moved into the land. He chased out the Amorites and the other people who lived in the land. So we too will serve the Lord, because he is our God.’
korean_text: 여호와께서 또 모든 백성들과 이 땅에 거주하던 아모리 족속을 우리 앞에서 쫓아내셨음이라 그러므로 우리도 여호와를 섬기리니 그는 우리 하나님이심이니이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord chased all the nations out
as we moved into the land
and the other people who lived in the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 땅에 살던 다른 백성들도

sentences.original_text: So we too will serve the Lord
